publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-638# Mark Ballard: Road Safetyâ€”That the Parliament notes the success of the Lothian and Borders Safety Camera Partnership in addressing the problems of speeding and serious road crashes and commends the pilot of 20 mph zones utilising flashing road signs outside seven Edinburgh primary schools in making roads safer for children.

S2M-638# Mark Ballard: Road Safety-That the Parliament notes the success of the Lothian and Borders Safety Camera Partnership in addressing the problems of speeding and serious road crashes and commends the pilot of 20 mph zones utilising flashing road signs outside seven Edinburgh primary schools in making roads safer for children.

S2M-638# Road Safety (lodged on 20 November 2003) Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Donald Gorrie*, Bill Butler*, Shiona Baird*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-638# Road Safety (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-638# Road Safety (lodged on 20 November 2003) Colin Fox*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-638# Road Safety (lodged on 20 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-638# Road Safety (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
